title: Over 10,000 NHS pharmacies begin treating people for common conditions
description: More than nine in ten community pharmacies in England – 10,265 in total – will be offering the ground-breaking initiative, with the health service making it easier and more convenient for people to access care.

title: Northern Ireland power-sharing deal could finally end Brexit's constitutional chaos
description: With the power-sharing government set to be restored in Northern Ireland, an end to constitutional chaos thrown up by Brexit may finally be in sight.

title: BT and Lloyds chiefs among new business advisers to Sunak
description: Allison Kirkby, who will become BT Group’s first female chief this week, will be named on Wednesday as one of 15 members of the prime minister’s 2024 business council, Sky News learns.

title: Pharmacy ‘revolution’ will cut NHS waiting lists, says Sunak
description: Rishi Sunak has promised a pharmacy “revolution” to cut NHS waiting lists. Writing for The Telegraph, the Prime Minister, who grew up and helped out in his mother’s pharmacy in Southampton, said new powers handed to pharmacists would free up around 10 million GP appointments a year.

title: Next government should declare NHS a national emergency, experts warn

title: Sunak confronts Varadkar over Ireland’s decision to challenge UK’s Troubles law
description: Rishi Sunak used a call with the Irish premier to confront his counterpart about the UK’s “disappointment” over Ireland’s decision to legally challenge the UK’s response to the Troubles.

title: Rishi Sunak makes awkward U-turn on fasting as he appears on ITV This Morning
description: Rishi Sunak was grilled by This Morning hosts Rylan Clark and Rochelle Humes about intermittent fasting. It has been reported that Mr Sunak fasts from Sunday evening to Tuesday morning in a bid to give his body a 'reset' after an indulgent weekend.

title: Rishi Sunak tucks into chicken dish and pastries after intermittent fasting ends
description: Sunak typically doesn't eat on Monday, which he says helps him combat his "weakness for sugary things" - apparently he loves Coca-Cola.

title: Rishi Sunak 'Absolutely' Confident He Will Win The General Election
description: Rishi Sunak has said he is “absolutely” confident he will win the next general election, despite a new poll showing the Tories have fallen even further behind Labour. In an interview with ITV’s This Morning, the prime minister refused to be drawn on the exact date he planned to go to the country.

title: Migrants will account for 92% of the UK's population boom in the coming years as numbers are set to grow by FIVE Birminghams
description: Data from the Office for National Statistics indicates that higher-than-expected immigration figures are set to see the numbers living in the UK grow by 6.6 million to 73.7 million by 2036.

title: 50% Of Business Leaders Want Keir Starmer As Next Prime Minister
description: Corporate leaders have said that they would have more business confidence if the Labour Party win the next general election.
